{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","title":"epiparameter data","description":"The database of epidemiological delay distibutions for a variety of infectious diseases and pathogens. Last modified 18/11/2022.\n","type":"object","properties":{"disease":{"description":"Disease defined by its symptoms.","examples":["ebola","measles"],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"pathogen":{"description":"Pathogen defined by its virus or bacteria.","examples":["SARS-CoV-2","monkeypox virus"],"type":"array","items":{"type":["string","null"]}},"genus":{"description":"The taxonomic genus classification of the pathogen.","examples":["ebolavirus","Morbillivirus"],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"delay_type":{"description":"The type of epidemiological delay distribution.","examples":["incubation period","serial interval"],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"author":{"description":"The surname of the first author.","examples":["Smith","Smith_Jones","Smith_etal"],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"year":{"description":"The year of publication","examples":["2019","2020"],"type":"array","items":{"type":"number"}}},"required":["pathogen","disease"],"additionalProperties":false}
